features: Multi-Purpose Cleaning — The PurSteam handheld steam cleaner machine easily and effortlessly cleans unsightly stains and stubborn dirt and grime on a wide range of surfaces. Works effectively on ceramic or laminate tiles, granite, waterproof wood flooring, and cotton or wool carpets. It's also incredible at removing grease around the kitchen sink, countertop, stove, and many other hard-to-reach areas.

Lightweight for Portable Use — With a small and handheld design, you can easily take this steam cleaner anywhere to handle quick jobs around the house, office, garage and more. This unit includes a long 9.8 foot power cord for convenient indoor and outdoor use, making it great for cleaning your car too!

Fast-heating Time — Give your space a 360° cleaning without the use of harsh cleaning products. This compact yet powerful whole-house cleaner tool heats quickly, and is an essential helper for the home and kitchen!

Safe for Pets and More — Freshen up bedding and furniture with the power of this all-in-one steam cleaner. Features safety lock technology and overheating protection. High pressure and temp of steam may cause some material to melt, damage, or deform. Please ensure the material can withstand the high temp 221°F (105°C) and pressure. This steam cleaner cleans naturally using only water, making it an ideal option for those with small children and pets.

9-piece Accessory Set — The Pursteam handheld steam cleaner includes a window and door cleaning tool, an ironing brush, an ironing brush cloth, a round nylon brush, a bent nozzle, a straight nozzle, an extension hose, a measuring cup and a funnel. Adjust it anyway you like to suit your cleaning needs!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Where Can I Use It? Bathrooms Use various attachments on this handheld steamer for cleaning bath tile and grout, toilets, sinks/drains, tubs, showers, baseboards, doors, and windows. The extension hose helps you reach farther. The bent and straight nozzles work in corners. Scrub grout with the stiff nylon brush. Kitchens So many uses in the kitchen! This handheld steam cleaner can clean sinks, drains, furnace rings and covers, cupboards, oven inner walls, trash cans, recycle cans, tile, and grout. Throughout the house you can clean doorknobs, windows, curtains, blinds, and spot clean floors. Bedrooms Clean mattresses, dressers, shoe organizers, and closet doors (even mirrors!) with the included attachments. Freshen clothes, children’s toys, or stuffed animals. Great for family spaces, too. Our hot steamer for furniture can clean upholstery, throw pillows, couches, and rugs/carpets. Garages and More! Got car seats? Want to steam clean car interiors or windows? This portable steamer can handle garbage cans, outdoor furniture, strollers, washing machines, and vents. For some applications, using a tool in addition to the steam will help, such as when you steam off wallpaper.

Quick Steps to Depressurize & Refill Steamer Release the Remaining Steam The water tank of this handheld steamer is pressurized to create steam. To refill the tank, release the pressure by holding the trigger button down until no more steam emits from the nozzle. Wait a few seconds longer before the next step. Press and Turn Safety Cap Press down the safety cap and turn it counterclockwise to open it. NOTE: The cap will not open when the steamer is pressurized. Refill Tank with Cup and Funnel You can use ordinary tap water! Fill the boiler tank with about 8.45 fl oz (250 ml) of water with the included cup. Pour it into the tank using the provided funnel. Do not fill the tank completely or there won’t be room for steam to build. Replace the cap and allow it to reheat. Steam away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Darn good steamer
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a darn good hand held steamer , my second time purchasing this one . I purchased others after my first one broke but could not find one that holds up to this one . As you can see in the photo and video . I had residue on my burner plate that just would not come off , not even with a sos pad ( and I swear by my Sos pads ) with a little help from my oven cleaner and some hot steam , stain came right out . Sometimes it takes a little more than hot steam to lift some stains but for the most part , it works like a charm . It’s small ( a little cumbersome) because you have to constantly hold down on the handle but I can maneuver it well being I’ve had one for almost 5 years before purchasing a replacement. I find putting on the parts very easy . My old one use to be a pain to unscrew the non , but the new one is very easy . I used tap water in the old one and never had a problem , but this go round I’ll use distilled water as most say it’s better because where I’m from , we have hard water .Now to the Con : the steamer comes with two flimsy brushes that melt easy upon use , most steamers come with at least one hard bristle bush this one comes with 2 soft brushes only . The company DO NOT sell extra brushes but will ship you ONE as long as your under warranty. I don’t need no company rationing off brushes through the mail one at a time for me , let me purchase as many as I want . I love cleaning and I use a brush on most of my cleaning jobs so I need brushes . By the time one brush come in the mail more stains will have build up .Suggestions: they should make and sell short bristle brushed as they might not melt as fast as the long bristle ones that come with the steamer . I know you can’t please everyone but at least sell extra brushes as to some the machine is useless without them . I love my steamer and am now on the prowl to find a brush from another company that will fit this steamer . Will share if I do happen to find one .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little steamer, Works well for cleaning and has a reasonable run time. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Steamer for the Price
reviews.reviewText: This steamer did a great job making steam quickly and it has a lot of attachment options. The water tank can hold more than one measuring cups worth of water and I got a decent amount of steam time before it needed to be refilled. You do have to allow the machine to cool down before you can remove the cap and refill due to the steam pressure that builds. The only small is I have is the bristles on the smaller round scrubber attachment wore down/melted a bit after one use. Overall it did a great job for what I needed and I’m happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great and came in perfect working condition. Fast shipping and delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars maybe we will see?
reviews.reviewText: It needs a water gage. I don't like that you can't fill it up if its still got some water in it cause of the pressure bc you can't remove the cap. You are busy you need to be able to just add water and go. It honestly needs a container you can just remove like with the steam mops. I like that its got several attachments. The first time I sprayed mine it was so powerful it actually scared me and made me and the cat jump. wow. i use both hands while spraying. it heats up quick so I like that. I like that it comes with a measuring cup however I think the hole is to small and you have to fill that cup up several times and pour in that funnel. who has time for that. we are busy. again a container that has a bigger hole would be better. now as far as cleaning we have issues. i attempted to clean the bathtub it was dirty it didnt remove any dirt at all. i guess it loosened it some but i still had to get my scrubber and scrub the dirt. i sprayed my oven which was barely dirty and again i had to spray it and scrub it. i sprayed my front door and then wiped it down. i know with my steam mop i mop my floors then i steam mop. so I guess with this I'll clean then spray it with this to just give it an extra touch cause it didnt actually remove any dirt. I watched a youtube video. mine didnt remove dirt like his. still worth the purchase though. still glad i got it. so I give it a 3. we will see how often it gets used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone needs this steamer
reviews.reviewText: This is 21 years of grime, and it wiped right off with this steamer (and a few attachments).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I bought my first steamer in February 2019 so it was well past the warranty when I discovered that I had lost the safety valve. After a few emails back and forth trying to find out if I could buy the missing part, customer service told me parts were not available but that they would refund me 20% on a new unit. It wasn't their fault that I lost the cap and they certainly didn't have to reimburse me 20% on a new steamer. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend their products...it's a great little steamer with a nice long cord.

reviews.reviewText: Doesn't deep clean as well as it should. Otherwise it is easy to use.
